name: Absorb
effect_1: Restores 540 Magicka when you block a spell.

name: Absorb Magic
effect_1:
Bolster your defenses, absorbing up to 4372 damage from the next spell projectile cast at you and healing for 15% of your Max Health.

While you have a shield equipped and this ability slotted, the amount of damage you can block is increased by 8% and the cost of blocking is reduced by 8%.
effect_2: Absorb the spell projectile and heal yourself instead of reflecting it.

name: Absorption Field
effect_1:
Create a globe of magic suppression for 12 seconds, removing and preventing all enemy area of effect abilities from occurring in the area.

Enemies within the globe are stunned, while enemy players will be silenced rather than stunned.

The globe also heals you and your allies for 204 Health every 0.5 seconds.
effect_2: The globe also heals you and your allies standing inside it.

name: Accelerate
effect_1: Bend time and space around you to gain Major Expedition for 4 seconds and Minor Force for 12 seconds, increasing your Movement Speed by 30% and Critical Damage by 10%.

name: Accelerated Growth
effect_1: When you heal yourself or an ally under 40% Health with a Green Balance ability you gain Major Mending, increasing your healing done by 25% for 3 seconds.

name: Accelerating Drain
effect_1:
Consume an enemy's life force, dealing 534 Magic Damage and restoring 20% of your missing Health every 1 second for 3 seconds. 

When you activate the drain, the enemy is stunned for 3 seconds.

When the drain ends you gain Minor Expedition, increasing your Movement Speed by 10% for 20 seconds.
effect_2: You gain Minor Expedition after the drain ends.

name: Accuracy
effect_1: Increases Weapon Critical rating by 1095.

name: Accursed Charge
effect_1: Spring across the battlefield to smash an enemy, dealing 10640 Physical Damage.

name: Acid Spray
effect_1: Fire a burst of arrows in one shot, dealing 683 Poison Damage to enemies in front of you, and dealing an additional 520 Poison Damage over 4 seconds.
effect_2: Deals Poison Damage and adds additional damage over time.

name: Acrobat
effect_1:
Increases your experience gain with the Bow skill line by 15%.

Decreases your fall damage taken by 10%.

name: Adrenaline Rush
effect_1: When you deal direct damage, you restore 950 Stamina. This effect can occur once every 5 seconds.

name: Advanced Species
effect_1:
Increases your damage done by 3% for each Animal Companion ability slotted.

Current Bonus: 0%.

name: Aggressive Horn
effect_1:
Sound a war horn to rally your forces, increasing you and your allies' Max Magicka and Max Stamina by 10% for 30 seconds.

You and your allies gain Major Force, increasing your Critical Damage by 15% for 9 seconds.
effect_2: You and your allies gain Major Force for a brief period after activation.

name: Agility
effect_1: Increases your Weapon Damage by 15%.

name: Agony Totem
effect_1:
Summon an effigy of bone at your feet that gives Minor Protection to you and your allies for 9.5 seconds, reducing damage taken by 8%. 

After 2 seconds, the totem instills fear in enemies, holding them in place for 4 seconds.

Allies can activate Pure Agony, causing enemies to take 168 Magic Damage over 5 seconds and applying Minor Vulnerability to them for the duration, increasing their damage taken by 8%.
effect_2: Allies can activate a synergy to damage and apply Minor Vulnerability to enemies.

name: Ambush
effect_1:
Flash through the shadows and ambush an enemy, dealing 565 Physical Damage and afflicting them with Minor Vulnerability for 8 seconds, increasing their damage taken by 8%.

Also grants you Empower, increasing the damage of your next Light Attack by 40%.
effect_2: Converts to a Stamina ability, and grants you Major Empower, increasing the damage of your next attack.

name: Amphibian
effect_1:
Increases your experience gain with the Restoration Staff skill line by 15%.

Increases your swimming speed by 50%.

name: Amplitude
effect_1: Increases your damage done against enemies by 1% for every 10% current Health they have.

name: Ancient Knowledge
effect_1:
Equipping a Flame Staff increases your damage done with single target abilities by 8%.

Equipping a Lightning Staff increases your damage done with area of effect abilities by 8%.

Equipping a Frost Staff reduces the cost of blocking by 36% and increases the amount of damage you block by 20%.

name: Animate Blastbones
effect_1:
Bring your allies back from the brink of death, resurrecting up to 3 allies at the target location.

You consume up to 3 other corpses in the area and summon a Blastbones for each corpse consumed.
effect_2: You consume other corpses in the area and summon Blastbones.

name: Annulment
effect_1: Surround yourself with a net of magic negation, gaining a damage shield that absorbs 2712 damage for 6 seconds. Damage shield strength capped at 40% of your Max Health.

name: Anti-Cavalry Caltrops
effect_1:
Hurl an exploding ball of caltrops that scatter over the target area, dealing 195 Physical Damage every 1 second and reducing Movement Speed by 30%.

The caltrops rapidly drain the Mount Stamina of any enemy in the area.
effect_2: Increases the duration and rapidly drains the Mount Stamina of any enemy in the area.

name: Arctic Blast
effect_1:
Send forth a blast of arctic cold, stunning your target for 3 seconds.

A portion of the winds envelop you, instantly healing for 1398 and an additional 278 Health every 2 seconds over 10 seconds.

This ability scales with your Max Health.
effect_2: Now requires a target to cast, but stuns the target.  Reduces the cost as the ability ranks up.

name: Arctic Wind
effect_1:
Envelop yourself in winter winds, instantly healing for 1354 and an additional 270 Health every 2 seconds over 10 seconds.

This ability scales with your Max Health.

name: Argonian Resistance
effect_1:
Increases your Max Health by 1000 and Disease Resistance by 2310.

Gain immunity to the Diseased status effect.

name: Arrow Barrage
effect_1: Launch a multitude of arrows into the sky to rain down, dealing 139 Physical Damage to enemies in the target area every 0.5 seconds for 8 seconds.
effect_2: Increases the range and radius.

name: Arrow Spray
effect_1: Fire a burst of arrows in one shot, dealing 683 Physical Damage to enemies in front of you.

name: Ash Cloud
effect_1: Summon a scorching cloud of ash at the target location, reducing enemy Movement Speed by 70% and healing you and your allies for 183 every 1 second.

name: Ashlander
effect_1:
Increases your experience gain with the Dual Wield skill line by 15%.

Reduces your damage taken from environmental lava by 50%.

name: Aspect Improvement

name: Aspect of Terror
effect_1: Summon a dark spirit to terrify up to 3 enemies, causing them to cower in fear for 2 seconds.

name: Assassin's Blade
effect_1: Thrust a magic blade with lethal precision to stab an enemy, dealing 410 Magic Damage. Deals 300% more damage to enemies below 25% Health.

name: Athletics
effect_1:
Increases the Movement Speed bonus of Sprint by 3% for each piece of Medium Armor equipped.

Current bonus: 0%.

Reduces the cost of Roll Dodge by 4% for each piece of Medium Armor equipped.

Current bonus: 0%.

name: Aurora Javelin
effect_1:
Hurl your spear at an enemy with godlike strength, dealing 554 Magic Damage, stunning them for 2 seconds, and knocking them back 8 meters.

You deal 2% additional damage with the spear for every 1 meter you are away from the target, up to a maximum of 40%.
effect_2: Deals additional damage based on the distance the spear travels.

name: Avid Boneyard
effect_1:
Desecrate the ground at the target location, dealing 2321 Frost Damage over 10 seconds.

Consumes a corpse on cast to deal 20% more damage.

You or an ally standing in the graveyard can activate the Grave Robber synergy, dealing 1324 Frost Damage to enemies in the area and healing you for the damage done.
effect_2: You can use your own synergy.

name: Backlash
effect_1:
Summon an expanding beam of pure sunlight to doom an enemy, dealing 410 Magic Damage to them and copying all their damage taken for 6 seconds and releasing 20% of it as additional Magic Damage to them.

Maximum copied damage: 4774.

name: Balance

Barter with Oblivion to trade vitality for power, sacrificing your Health in exchange for 3000 Magicka.

After the exchange is complete, you gain Major Resolve and Major Ward for 23 seconds, increasing your Physical and Spell Resistance by 5280.

The exchange reduces your healing done and damage shield strength by 50% for 4 seconds.
effect_2: After the exchange is complete, you gain Major Resolve and Major Ward.

name: Balanced Blade
effect_1: Reduces the Stamina cost of your Two-Handed abilities by 15%.

name: Balanced Warrior
effect_1: Increases your Weapon Damage by 6% and Spell Resistance by 2640.

name: Baleful Mist
effect_1:
Dissolve into a dark mist, reducing your damage taken by 75% and dealing 201 Magic Damage to nearby enemies every 1 second for 4 seconds.

Entering this form removes and grants immunity to all disabling and immobilization effects, but you cannot be healed and your Magicka Recovery is disabled.

name: Ball of Lightning

Transform yourself into pure energy and flash forward, stunning enemies near origin location for 2 seconds. Also absorbs any spell projectiles directed at you for 2 seconds. 

Casting again within 4 seconds costs 50% more Magicka.

name: Ballista

name: Banish the Wicked

name: Barrier

name: Bat Swarm
effect_1: Darken the sky with a cloud of bats, dealing 458 Magic Damage to nearby enemies every 1 second for 5 seconds.

name: Battle Resurrection
effect_1: Reduces the time it takes you to resurrect another player by 30% while you are in a PvP area.

name: Battle Roar
effect_1: When you cast an Ultimate ability, you restore 46 Health, 46 Magicka, and 46 Stamina for each point of the Ultimate's cost.

name: Battle Rush
effect_1: Increases your Stamina Recovery by 30% for 10 seconds after killing a target.

name: Battlefield Mobility
effect_1: Increases your Movement Speed while blocking by 60%.

name: Beckoning Armor
effect_1:
Wrap yourself in hardened bone, granting you Major Resolve and Major Ward, increasing your Physical Resistance and Spell Resistance by 5280 for 20 seconds.  

While active, enemies that strike you with ranged attacks will be pulled toward you once every 3 seconds.

Creates a corpse when the effect completes.
effect_2: Pulls in ranged enemies.

name: Berserker Rage

Strike an enemy with a vicious blow, dealing 1647 Physical Damage.

This attack ignores the target's Resistance and grants you Physical and Spell Resistance equal to the amount ignored for 8 seconds.

You are immune to all disabling, snare, and immobilization effects for the duration.
effect_2: You are immune to all disabling, snare, and immobilization effects for the duration.

name: Berserker Strike
effect_1:
Strike an enemy with a vicious blow, dealing 1594 Physical Damage.

This attack ignores the target's Resistance and grants you Physical and Spell Resistance equal to the amount ignored for 8 seconds.

name: Betty Netch
effect_1: Call a betty netch to your side, which restores 4224 Magicka to you over 24 seconds and grants you Major Sorcery, increasing your Spell Damage by 20%.

name: Binding Javelin
effect_1: Hurl your spear at an enemy with godlike strength, dealing 617 Physical Damage and stunning them for 4 seconds.
effect_2: Converts to Stamina. Stuns the enemy for longer instead of knocking back.

name: Bird of Prey
effect_1:
Invoke the spirit of agility to gain Major Expedition 6 seconds, increasing your Movement Speed by 30%.

While slotted gain Minor Berserk, increasing damage done by 8%.
effect_2: Grants Minor Berserk.

name: Biting Jabs

Launch a relentless assault, striking enemies in front of you four times with your Aedric spear. The spear deals 341 Physical Damage to the closest enemy and 137 Physical Damage to all other enemies.

Envelop yourself in a protective cloak of razors, gaining Major Evasion for 15 seconds, reducing damage from area attacks by 25%.

name: Blade of Woe

Call the weapon of the Dark Brotherhood to your hand and deliver a killing blow to an unsuspecting target. Experience from this target is reduced by 75%.

Summon a flaming skeleton from the ground after 2.5 seconds. The skeleton runs after the target and explodes when it gets close to them, dealing 1232 Flame Damage to all enemies nearby.

When the shield expires it explodes outward, dealing 30% of the damage it absorbed to nearby enemies.

Send your spear into the heavens to bring down a shower of divine wrath, dealing 636 Magic Damage to enemies in the area and an additional 188 Magic Damage every 1 second for 8 seconds.

An ally near the spear can activate the Blessed Shards synergy, restoring 3960 Magicka or Stamina, whichever maximum is higher.

name: Blessing of Protection
effect_1:
Slam your staff down to activate its blessings, healing you and your allies in front of you for 615 Health.

Also grants Minor Resolve and Minor Ward, increasing you and your allies' Physical Resistance and Spell Resistance by 1320 for 8 seconds.

name: Blessing Of Restoration
effect_1:
Slam your staff down to activate its blessings, healing you and your allies in front of you for 824 Health.

Also grants Minor Resolve and Minor Ward, increasing you and your allies' Physical Resistance and Spell Resistance by 1320 for 15 seconds.

Summon a decaying skeleton from the ground after 2.5 seconds. The skeleton runs after the target and explodes when it gets close to them, dealing 1412 Disease Damage to all enemies nearby and applying Major Defile to them for 4 seconds, reducing their healing received and Health Recovery by 30%

Slice an enemy with both weapons to cause deep lacerations, dealing 241 Physical Damage with each weapon and causing them to bleed for an additional 1275 Physical Damage over 10 seconds.

You also heal for 173 Health every 2 seconds for the duration.

name: Blood Magic
effect_1: When you hit an enemy with a Dark Magic ability, you heal for 10% of your Max Health. This effect can occur once every 0.5 seconds.

name: Blood Rage
effect_1: When you deal damage, the duration of your Werewolf Transformation is increased by 4 seconds. This effect can occur once every 5 seconds.

Allows you to infect another player with Noxiphilic Sanguivoria once every 7 days by returning to the Vampire ritual site. 

Players already infected with Lycanthropy cannot be infected with Noxiphilic Sanguivoria.

effect_1:
Sacrifice your own power to repair damaged flesh, healing you or an ally in front of you for 1273 Health but applying Minor Defile to yourself for 4 seconds, reducing your healing received and Health Recovery by 15%.

Consumes a corpse near you when cast to heal a second target.
effect_2: Consumes a corpse to heal a second target.

name: Bloodmoon

Allows you to infect another player with Lycanthropy once every 7 days by returning to the Werewolf ritual site. 

Players already infected with Sanguinare Vampiris cannot be infected with Lycanthropy.

name: Bloodthirst

Flood an enemy with steel, battering them with five consecutive attacks that each deal 141 Physical Damage. 

The final hit deals 300% more damage and heals you for 60% of the damage caused.
effect_2: Heals you for a percentage of the damage caused by the final hit.

name: Blue Betty
effect_1:
Call a betty netch to your side, which restores 4800 Magicka to you over 27 seconds and grants you Major Sorcery, increasing your Spell Damage by 20%.

When the netch is summoned, it removes 1 negative effect from you.
effect_2: The netch removes a negative effect from you.

name: Blur
effect_1: Surround yourself in a phantasmic aura to gain Major Evasion, decreasing damage from area attacks by 25% for 26 seconds.

name: Bolstering Darkness

name: Bolt Escape
effect_1:
Transform yourself into pure energy and flash forward, stunning enemies near origin location for 2 seconds.

name: Bombard
effect_1:
Fire a burst of arrows in one shot, dealing 683 Physical Damage to enemies in front of you. 

Enemies afflicted are immobilized and have their Movement Speed reduced by 40% for 4 seconds
effect_2: Snares and immobilizeses enemies hit.

name: Bond With Nature
effect_1: When one of your animal companions is killed or unsummoned, you're restored 1260 Health.

name: Bone Armor
effect_1:
Wrap yourself in hardened bone, granting you Major Resolve and Major Ward, increasing your Physical Resistance and Spell Resistance by 5280 for 17 seconds.

name: Bone Surge

Surround yourself with a whirlwind of bones, gaining a damage shield that absorbs 30% of your Max Health for 6 seconds.

An ally near you can activate the Spinal Surge synergy, granting the ally and up to 3 other friendly targets near them a damage shield that absorbs 50% of their Max Health for 6 seconds and Major Vitality, increasing their healing received by 30%.
effect_2: The synergy increases healing received.

name: Bone Totem
effect_1:
Place a totem of bone at your feet that gives Minor Protection to you and your allies for 8 seconds, reducing your damage taken by 8%. 

After 2 seconds, the totem instills fear in enemies, holding them in place for 4 seconds.

name: Boneyard

Desecrate the ground at the target location, dealing 2244 Frost Damage over 10 seconds.

Consumes a corpse on cast to deal 20% more damage.

name: Bound Armor

Protect yourself with the power of Oblivion, creating a suit of Daedric mail that increases your block mitigation by 36% for 3 seconds.

name: Chef

name: Claws of Anguish

name: Claws of Life
